cause.description:
My Mother Sheila Rennie, was diagnosed with breast cancer in 1999 and underwent treatment and was given a clean bill of health after treatment. In 2003 she relapsed and the cancer was too far gone, had spread to her liver and head and she survived only four months, passing on May 25, 2004. She would be honored with anyone who supports the missions we've listed here and would be very proud of us! Mom I miss u soooo much, and i love you
$2 WILL BE DONATED FOR THE MEMBERS WHO JOINS AND I'LL DONATE IT!! IT WILL BE APPLIED ONCE A MONTH FOR THE MEMBERS!
1. More treatment needed
2. Earlier Detection, Precautions and Awareness needed!
3. More responsibility on medical practioners to enforce patients to be tested.
cause.mission: Raise awareness, early detection, Moral and Financial Support
cause.name: In Loving Memory Of Sheila Rennie, Support Breast Cancer Research
